parameters.definition: Sandwich production per day by a dine-in place
Employees needed to operate a dine-in place
Sandwich production per day by a food-truck
Employees needed to operate a food-truck
Minimum number of sandwiches to be made per day

description: A sandwich company can open two types of stores, a dine-in place and a food-truck. A dine-in place can make \param{DineInProd} sandwiches per day and requires \param{DineInEmp} employees to operate. A food-truck can make \param{FoodTruckProd} sandwiches per day and requires \param{FoodTruckEmp} employees to operate. The company must make at least \param{MinSandProd} sandwiches per day but they only have available \param{TotalEmp} employees. How many of each type of store should the company open to minimize the total number of stores?
